ygData.subject: Re: New Patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can verify this.  Some of the advertised smithing changes don t seem to be working, but my tomahawk went off or proc ed as they say in EQ lingo, and my
ygData.messageBody:
George Holt wrote:

> for all of those wondering... the new patch supposedly fixes the
> spell casting weapon vs song bug....as well as updating one of the
> songs to require mana..in addition there is no way for bards to speed
> up mana regen... (sorry, those buffs won't work...) anyways... just
> login and read the patch message... you'll be much happier with your
> characters...

I can verify this. Some of the advertised smithing changes don't seem
to be working, but my tomahawk went off or "proc"ed as they say in EQ
lingo, and my song was neither interrupted nor locked. It was
fantastic!

Jyzan
